item.title: 시온 - Braindead
item.description:
작사: 시온
/ KY: 82278

braincells, melting pot
dead self, fusing mind
I’m not me like your not you
slavery, thot

looking in the mirror I can’t see me
just a donkey think he could’ve made you stay for once
you look in the mirror and keep laughing
you got rid of me and got a significant other one

oh I feel like a zombie jealous of the lovers brains
so imma come along and take a bite intelligence
to avoid getting hurt again
be driven into breakdowns hurricane
maybe I need to hypnotize
don’t love you, don’t love you, don’t love you

I’m a braindead lover for you
I don’t care if my mind falls apart
I’m already just a dead man, a fool
falling for these empty words you spit out

how could you be so ruthless
stupid zombie get your brain to work
I’m a braindead lover for you
I’m a braindead lover for who?

I know that, I know that
I know I’m inside your walls
but

I don’t care, I don’t care
I don’t even wanna go

just let me be, aside you, I can be a different person
as long as you like me I could be anything you want
oh fool

oh I feel like a zombie jealous of the lovers brains
so imma come along and take a bite intelligence
to avoid getting hurt again
be driven into breakdowns hurricane
maybe I need to hypnotize
don’t love you, don’t love you, don’t love you

I’m a braindead lover for you
I don’t care if my mind falls apart
I’m already just a dead man, a fool
falling for these empty words you spit out

how could you be so ruthless
stupid zombie get your brain to work
I’m a braindead lover for you
I’m a braindead lover for who?

item.title: 시온 - cutlery collector
item.description:
작사: 시온
/ KY: 82815

Don’t come near cause your atmosphere
Trims my hair yeah like you shorn a lamb
Your words pierce through my stainless steel
Iron stench over you prevail
Twisted wishes that made me die
Broken Mirrors that left behind
Shards distorting the truth to lies
Bloody cuts turning pain to life
Cutting me open and switching my insides
Don’t make me an avatar girl just let me die
And they all say that I have changed
But oh nobody knew why
Cause you’re a cutlery collector
You cut open my mind
You’re a cutlery collector needles all over you
Stitching my heart but my body is bruised
You can control my brain
I’m dumb I’m numb got no clue
That I’m sitting inside
An iron maiden hugging me to
Chopped off heart that is served on plates
You keep eating all of my veins
Drinking blood out of all my pores
Jesus save me and all the poor
Victims of the devil in disguise
One’s believing in these mermaid lies
Let us cut their fins in half
Eat them raw and repay these lies
Cutting me open and switching my insides
Don’t make me an avatar girl just let me die
And they all say that I have changed
But oh nobody knew why
Cause you’re a cutlery collector
You cut open my mind
You’re a cutlery collector needles all over you
Stitching my heart but my body is bruised
You can control my brain
I’m dumb I’m numb got no clue
That I’m sitting inside
An iron maiden hugging me to death
People think I’m crazy
Cause they see a puppy smile
Oh they overlooking the wolf that is stuck inside
Bruises on my wrist they say I hurt myself but I
Know that it’s a bite
You can control my brain
I’m dumb I’m numb got no clue
You can control my brain
I’m dumb I’m numb got no clue
You can control my brain
I’m dumb I’m numb got no clue
That I’m sitting inside
An iron maiden hugging me to death
